channel.title: ~VPS~ Help
channel.description:
I bought vps for my server and its my first time how do i add files to the vps? Thanks for your help
And its Windows 1gb ram

item.title: ~VPS~ Help
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

b4k 2 lumby:

thanks but when i go on the remote desktop connection its asking me for a user n pass like if it was windows. And the vps user n pass doesnt work

Check the email adress you used to purchase your vps, it will provide all details to login.

Read full topic

item.title: ~VPS~ Help
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Get the vps ip then go to your RDP (Remote desktop protocol) then put the ip in it, basically it connect to the vps (sometimes called remote desktop connection), then upload your files to a site, then open up a browser on your vps and download them. Or go to the control panel (If it has one with a file manager) and upload the files in rar format.

But remember, you need to download Winrar etc before putting them on your vps.

Read full topic
